item.title: Accept That You're Just Weird
item.description:
[caption id="attachment_1683" align="alignright" width="300" caption="Thomas Shahan on Flickr"][/caption]

I have come to the realization that I am a weird dude. Furthermore, I have finally accepted that I am one of the weirdest people I know.

For a while, I was holding out that I just had a few eccentricities related to my exercise and dietary habits. After a while, though, these things started to impact other areas of my life, and the weirdness started to grow. An interest in barefoot running turned into a general refusal to wear shoes. A concern with healthy food led to eating raw meat. It became very hard to deny that Iâ€™m just strange.
